messages.1: You are standing on a barren plateau.
messages.2: You are on a rocky mountain path.
messages.3: You are on the top of a steep cliff. A space shuttle is visible below.
messages.4: You are on a ledge halfway down the cliff face.
messages.5: You are at the base of the cliff.
messages.6: You hit the ground with a thud.
messages.7: You are lost in the forest.
messages.8: You are at the top of a tree. Dense vegitation can be seen all around.
messages.9: You are on a flat plain. A spaceship is visible to the south. A fierce looking robot is guarding the spaceship.
messages.11: The explosion blows you to the south but you seem to be alright.
messages.12: You are lost in the desert.
messages.14: You are standing in a airlock. The inner door is locked.
messages.16: The door opens and you go in.
messages.17: You are in the main control room. There is a slot for a fuel capsule and a lever.
messages.18: Nothing happens. You notice that a fuel gauge shows zero.
messages.19: With a roar the ship takes off on automatic pilot. After a while you hear the engines cut out.
messages.20: You are in a long twisty corridor.
messages.21: You are in the ships engine room. You can see a warm glow from the south.
messages.22: You are lost in a maze of machinary which all looks alike.
messages.23: As you enter the room you are fried to a cinder by the radiation.
messages.24: You are standing near the main reactor. The radiation would kill an unprotected mortal.
messages.25: You are in a airlock. An outer door leads west.
messages.26: The outer door opens and you are blown into space.
messages.27: You are standing outside a familiar looking Time Machine. The entrance is locked.
messages.28: You are in the Time Machine.
messages.29: You are in a large empty room.
messages.30: You are in an empty boot room.
messages.31: You are in a suit locker.
messages.32: You are in a large control room. A large circlular control console is in the middle of the room. The console has three buttons (red blackand white).There is a slot here for a time crystal.
messages.33: You feel queasy as you instantly go into hyperspace.
messages.34: You are standing in a cave entrance. The door to the Time Machine is to the north.
messages.35: You are lost in a labyrinth of twisty tunnels.
messages.36: You are standing on the edge of a ravine. The walls glow with a greenish light.
messages.37: You are standing outside the Time Machine. You see a house to the south.
messages.38: You are standing on the front porch of your house. The door is locked.
messages.39: You try the lockpick but it does'nt work.
messages.40: CONGRATULATIONS. You have escaped from the planet and are safely home. I Hope you've enjoyed playing.
messages.41: You seem to be dead. Better luck next time.
messages.42: You are on a rough rocky mountain path.
messages.45: You see nothing but grassy hills in all directions.
messages.46: You are standing in a large cave. You can see a strange glow from the south.
